extendedInfo.description: Enjoy Sphero and never miss a fun moment with your pets, kids or an incredible feat. Use the built-in camera on your Android device to record video or take snapshots while you simultaneously drive Sphero. Will your SpheroCam video go viral? Record, upload and find out! You need to own a Sphero Robotic Ball in order to use this application! Visit gosphero.com to get Sphero, learn more from our tutorial videos, or become part of the Sphero community. For exclusive content and the latest updates, become a fan of Sphero on Facebook at facebook.com/gosphero and follow us on Twitter at @gosphero Enjoy SpheroCam! ****************************************************** FEATURES: ****************************************************** Â° Easy to use Joystick control. Â° Record video or take photos. Â° Share or upload videos and images from your own photo library. Â° Simple 2-finger gesture to adjust Spheroâs heading.

reviews.title: Only records 4 seconds of vid
reviews.comment: Will record 4 seconds then no more..great idea but sort out the problem! Then 5 stars
reviews.author: danny smith

reviews.title: Only Records 4 to 5 Seconds
reviews.comment: Only records 5 seconds? What\'s the point of recording your Sphero? By the time you have done something cool it has already stopped recording. Plus then the pictures and video are low quality. Disappointed with this app. This app would be 5 stars if I was able to record longer.
reviews.author: Armando Raviz\303\251

reviews.title: Very cool idea, poor execution
reviews.comment: Camera works for a whole 3 seconds before it stops recording (due to lack of internal phone memory methinks). However, there is plenty of room on the removable sd card and no option of where to store captured video. App also seems spastic compared to other sphero apps. Great idea, but bottom line... a fail that will need improvement just to be able to function :(
reviews.author: Jason Holloway

reviews.title: Another half baked app from Orbotix
reviews.comment: 5 seconds only recording is useless. Unable to set the video resolution is pointless. Tail orientation control is missing. Come on Orbotix, could you please stop throwing half baked apps on this market ?
reviews.author: Frederic Mottiat

reviews.title: Brutal
reviews.comment: Crashed my entire phone n rebooted .... doesnt work
reviews.author: Mike Milson

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: Only takes 5 seconds of video and then I hear the camera attempting to focus and when I view the video afterwards it is 5 sec long and freezes when the lens was attempting to focus. Pictures seem fine.
reviews.author: Drew Hurlbut

reviews.title: Video
reviews.comment: Don\'t recording here and pic is too small.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Same as others
reviews.comment: 5 seconds of video. Poor no fix insight was supposed to be updated weeks ago
reviews.author: Michael Smith

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Droid Bionic
reviews.comment: It records fine enough, but it doesn\'t playback properly.  The video is a mess of purple and green pixels and  will only show the first 2 seconds.  I\'ve tried recording several times and I still can\'t get it to playback properly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ask one question
reviews.comment: Where you get that ball if have at malaysia i want buyying
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please Fix
reviews.comment: Please fix the bug. It doesn\'t record more than 3 seconds!
reviews.author: Talal AlShareef

reviews.title: Only 4 sec of video and no sound
reviews.comment: It would be awesome if it could record more and with sound. I press record and it seems like it\'s working, but the clip is only four seconds long and silent.
reviews.author: Martin Zaya
